name: snacraft
description: Snacraft is an IO game inspired on classic snake and Minecraft

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css && npm run cp-other-content
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/css && rm -rf dist/js && rm -rf dist/fonts && rm -rf dist/img && rm -rf dist/snd
scripts.cp-other-content: npm run cp-other-content-fonts && npm run cp-other-content-img && npm run cp-other-content-js-vendor && npm run cp-other-content-snd
